entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
